00144             function                get_category_id( $Options )
00145             {
00146                   try
00147                   {
00148                         $DirectCategoryName = false;
00149 
00150                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'direct_category_name' , false ) !== false )
00151                         {
00152                               $DirectCategoryName = $Options->get_setting( 'direct_category_name' );
00153                         }
00154                         elseif( $Options->get_setting( 'category_name' , false ) !== false )
00155                         {
00156                               $DirectCategoryName = $Options->get_setting( 'category_name' );
00157                         }
00158                         
00159                         if( $DirectCategoryName === false )
00160                         {
00161                               return( $Options->get_setting( 'direct_category' , 0 ) );
00162                         }
00163                         else
00164                         {
00165                               return( $this->CategoryAccess->get_category_id( $DirectCategoryName ) );
00166                         }
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }

00204             function                draw_categories_catalogue_rec( $Records , $RootId , $Templates = false )
00205             {
00206                   try
00207                   {
00208                         $DisplayTemplates = $this->CategoryViewTemplates->get_categories_catalogue_templates( $Templates );
00209                         $Children = $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_children( $RootId , $Records );
00210                         
00211                         if( isset( $Children[ 0 ] ) )
00212                         {
00213                               $RetCode = get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'start_tag' );
00214                               foreach( $Children as $k => $v )
00215                               {
00216                                     $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'start_item_tag' );
00217                                     $RetCode  = $this->String->print_record( $RetCode , $v );
00218                                     $RetCode .= $this->draw_categories_catalogue_rec( 
00219                                           $Records , get_field( $v , 'id' ) , $Templates
00220                                     );
00221                                     $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'end_item_tag' );
00222                                     $RetCode  = $this->String->print_record( $RetCode , $v );
00223                               }
00224                               $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'end_tag' );
00225                               return( $RetCode );
00226                         }
00227                         
00228                         return( '' );
00229                   }
00230                   catch( Exception $e )
00231                   {
00232                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00233                   }
00234             }

00262             function                draw_categories_catalogue( $Name , $Templates = false )
00263             {
00264                   try
00265                   {
00266                         $id = $this->CategoryAccess->get_category_id( $Name );
00267                               
00268                         $Items = $this->CategoryAccess->select_categories_list( $id );
00269                         
00270                         return( $this->draw_categories_catalogue_rec( $Items , $id , $Templates ) );
00271                   }
00272                   catch( Exception $e )
00273                   {
00274                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00275                   }
00276             }

00342             function                draw_categories_catalogue_part( $Options , $Records , $Templates = false )
00343             {
00344                   try
00345                   {
00346                         $DisplayTemplates = $this->CategoryViewTemplates->get_categories_catalogue_part_templates(
00347                               $Options , $Templates
00348                         );
00349 
00350                         $RetCode = '';
00351                         
00352                         foreach( $Records as $k => $v )
00353                         {
00354                               $SubcategoriesCount = $this->CategoryAccess->get_children_count( get_field( $v , 'id' ) );
00355                               if( $SubcategoriesCount )
00356                               {
00357                                     $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'item' );
00358                               }
00359                               else
00360                               {
00361                                     $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'leaf' );
00362                               }
00363                               $RetCode  = $this->String->print_record( $RetCode , $v );
00364                         }
00365                         
00366                         return( $RetCode );
00367                   }
00368                   catch( Exception $e )
00369                   {
00370                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00371                   }
00372             }

00392             function                draw_categories_catalogue_part_view( $Options )
00393             {
00394                   try
00395                   {
00396                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'cid' , 'set' ) )
00397                         {
00398                               $id = $this->Security->get_gp( 'cid' , 'integer' );
00399                         }
00400                         else
00401                         {
00402                               $id = $this->get_category_id( $Options );
00403                         }
00404 
00405                         $Items = $this->CategoryAccess->get_children( $id );
00406                         
00407                         $this->Output = $this->draw_categories_catalogue_part( $Options , $Items );
00408                   }
00409                   catch( Exception $e )
00410                   {
00411                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00412                   }

00433             function                draw_categories_path( $Options )
00434             {
00435                   try
00436                   {
00437                         $id = $this->get_category_id( $Options );
00438                         
00439                         $Items = $this->CategoryAccess->select_categories_list( $id );
00440                         
00441                         $cid = $this->Security->get_gp( 'cid' , 'integer' , $id );
00442                         
00443                         $Path = $this->CategoryAlgorithms->get_previous_items( $Items , $cid );
00444 
00445                         $RetCode = array();
00446                         
00447                         foreach( $Path as $i => $Item )
00448                         {
00449                               $RetCode [] = '<a href="./catalogue.html?cid='.$Item->id.'">'.$Item->title.'</a>';
00450                         }
00451                         
00452                         $RetCode = implode( '&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;' , $RetCode );
00453                         
00454                         $this->Output = $RetCode;
00455                   }
00456                   catch( Exception $e )
00457                   {
00458                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00459                   }
00460             }

00488             function                draw_categories_structure_rec( $RootId , $DisplayTemplates = false )
00489             {
00490                   try
00491                   {
00492                         $Children = $this->CategoryAccess->get_children( $RootId );
00493                         
00494                         $RetCode = '';
00495                         
00496                         if( isset( $Children[ 0 ] ) )
00497                         {
00498                               $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'start_tag' );
00499                               foreach( $Children as $k => $v )
00500                               {
00501                                     $SubTree = $this->draw_categories_structure_rec( $v->id , $DisplayTemplates );
00502 
00503                                     $RetCode .= $SubTree === '' ?       get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'start_leaf_tag' ) : 
00504                                                                                     get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'start_item_tag' );
00505                                     $RetCode  = $this->String->print_record( $RetCode , $v );
00506                                     $RetCode .= $SubTree;
00507                                     $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'end_item_tag' );
00508                               }
00509                               $RetCode .= get_field( $DisplayTemplates , 'end_tag' );
00510                         }
00511                         
00512                         return( $RetCode );
00513                   }
00514                   catch( Exception $e )
00515                   {
00516                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00517                   }
00518             }

00542             private function  output_root( &$Options , $id )
00543             {
00544                   try
00545                   {
00546                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'output_root' , 1 ) )
00547                         {
00548                               $this->Output = '<div class="tree_control"><ul class="ltr"><li id="phtml_'.$id.'" class="open" '.
00549                                                       'rel="not_selectable"><a href="#"><ins>&nbsp</ins>{lang:category_tree_header;default=/}</a>'.
00550                                                       $this->Output.'</li></ul></div>';
00551                         }
00552                         else
00553                         {
00554                               $this->Output = '<div class="tree_control">'.$this->Output.'</div>';
00555                         }
00556                   }
00557                   catch( Exception $e )
00558                   {
00559                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00560                   }
00561             }

00581             function                draw_categories_tree( &$Options )
00582             {
00583                   try
00584                   {
00585                         /* когда-то здесь была выборка имени категории из GET/POST массивов, но это не безопасно, 
00586                            поэтому, она была убрана, раз вы читаете эти комментарии, то скорее всего у вас не работает 
00587                            дерево в админке, надо подумать, как его починить */
00588                            
00589                         
00590                         $id = $this->get_category_id( $Options );
00591 
00592                         $DisplayTemplates = $this->CategoryViewTemplates->get_default_category_structure_templates( $Options );
00593 
00594                         $this->Output = $this->draw_categories_structure_rec( $id , $DisplayTemplates );
00595 
00596                         $this->output_root( $Options , $id );
00597                   }
00598                   catch( Exception $e )
00599                   {
00600                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00601                   }
00602             }

00626             function                view( $Options )
00627             {
00628                   try
00629                   {
00630                         $ContextSet = get_package( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00631                         
00632                         $PackagePath = dirname( __FILE__ );
00633                         
00634                         $ContextSet->add_context( $PackagePath.'/conf/cfcx_categories_tree' );
00635                         
00636                         $ContextSet->add_context( $PackagePath.'/conf/cfcx_categories_catalogue' );
00637                         
00638                         $ContextSet->add_context( $PackagePath.'/conf/cfcx_categories_catalogue_part' );
00639                         
00640                         $ContextSet->add_context( $PackagePath.'/conf/cfcx_categories_path' );
00641                         
00642                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00643                         
00644                         return( $this->Output );
00645                   }
00646                   catch( Exception $e )
00647                   {
00648                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00649                   }
00650             }
